# Professional Headshots NYC | Corporate Business Headshots

  

**Corporate Photographer NYC** \- In the climate of extreme **business**
competition in **New York City** , having a unique and **professional
headshot** is essential. The client is looking for a trustworthy, approachable
and professional individual. Your photograph will give an immediate impression
of you.

# Get Your Professional LinkedIn HeadshotS NYC Today!

  

It's the time for you to step out from the crowd and become a thought leader.
**Don't be afraid to move forward with your head high and show your proud face
to everybody.** We are the only company that knows what the modern headshot is
and we are on your side. Let us know what your goal is and we will do the very
first step for you in this direction. Professional headshot will open you
doors to get there.

Personal branding is an important subject to any entrepreneur, and a
professional headshot plays a critical role. Even if what you do isn’t
particularly “public” or “glamorous,” your headshot will influence how others
perceive you and your business. **This will invariably affect their decision
to invest in you and your work.** People would naturally want to collaborate
with you, it will attract the right audience and instigate to trust you
because of what they see. And our specialty is **female corporate NY
headshots**.

## OUR RECENT CLIENTS WHO GAVE US 5-STARS REVIEWS:

##  
Corporate Photography step by Step guide  

Purchase a package, during the check out process you will be asked for
specific details and preferable time/date for the shoot  
 **If you have  any questions or need a custom quote send us an email at
info@ceoportrait.com  
**

### **Photoshoot Schedule**

We will reach out to you momentarily to confirm all the details. It's always
better to plan the shoot in advance, at least 1 - 2 weeks before, we recommend
you select some sample photos your like from our website, so we can better
understand your ideas and preferences.

###  **Makeup and Hair Services**

We always bring finishing powder, lint roller, blotting paper, so we can make
sure that you look perfect on the photos. We don’t provide full makeup/hair
services for corporate shoots and suggest everyone to come prepared. If you
still need it, please contact us so we can organize everything for you.

### **Outfits for the shoot**

Please make sure clothes are pressed and clean, try new clothes on before the
shoot, we don't recommend to wear baggy, bulky fitting clothing. Make a final
decision on the outfit for your employees before the shoot, pay attention to
such details as corporate branded accessories, tie and so on.

### **Background color**

If you already have a certain website style and would like to replicate it,
please let us know, so we can prepare/bring all the equipment. On the other
hand, if you're not quite sure on what background/style of the headshots you
want to go with, you can always browse through our website or ask us and we
will guide and help you to make the final decision.

### **Reminder**

Please send a reminder to your team members and ask them to come prepared and
sleep well before the shoot.  
We will provide you with contact information of our team for your building
security in advance.

###  **Arrival Time**

We always come at least 30 minutes before the shoot to make sure we're all set
and ready to go on time for you.

###  **Small Portable Equipment**

We use modern gear and come only with a backpack/regular suitcase so we don’t
need freight elevator or access to a outlets.

###  **right spot in your office**

Prepare a spot in your office for the shoot. Don't worry about the natural
lighting, as we bring our own strobe light. We don't need a lot of space, we
can even set it up in a hallway. On the other hand, it's always better to have
an allocated space, like a conference room, it will be more comfortable for
your team members, so they can feel more relaxed during the shoot.

###  **Test Photo**

We will do a series of test photos before we start the actual shoot to make
sure that everything looks exactly as you desire.

### **Final Pictures selection**

We always bring a computer on all our photoshoots, we connect camera and
review the photos in real-time to make sure that you got the picture you like
and we can mark it for retouching.

###  **Photo Editing Process**

Our retouching services include making any necessary adjustments to skin
texture, removing any imperfections, adding brightness to teeth, hair editing,
outfit adjustments, body sculpting (if needed), background corrections and
everything else that you would like us to do. If you're planning to use these
photos for your corporate website, we can even work directly with your web
designer to make sure all the requirements are met.

### **extra options**

We can always provide extra options for you, such as candid and group shots,
that you can use as marketing materials. Just let us know if anything else is
needed.

###  **turnaround time**

Our turnaround time is usually 5-7 days. But we can do it faster if you have a
specific deadline, we don't charge extra for that. All the services are
included in our packages. We'll send you a link to download all the digital
files.

##  
YOUR NEXT STEPs  

  1. **Choose and purchase** your professional headshot package.

  2.  **We'll contact YOU** to discuss all the fine details, including the date of your photoshoot.

  3. We'll send you a link to **download digital files**. The same day options are available.  

##  
WHY CHOOSE US?  

  * First of all, because we're the best **Corporate Photographers in New York**!

  * Because you haven't had a **modern** headshot taken recently.

  * Because you need to create or improve your **personal brand.**

  *  **Because business professionals are more willing to work with people who have strong personal brands and successful track records.**

  * Because **entrepreneurs** need to present themselves in a professional way and a modern headshot will do just that.

  * Because we make it a goal to work with only the **best photographers**.

  * Because we have more than **10 years** of experience!

  * Because we're not just **super fast** , we're very good at what we do!  

##  
WHO NEEDS PROFESSIONAL HEADSHOTS in NYC?  

  * Entrepreneurs

  * Real Estate Brokers

  * Public Speakers

  * Models

  * Actors

  * Artists

  * Creative People

  * Musicians  

##  
WHY YOU NEED A PROFESSIONAL HEADSHOT in ny TODAY!  

Everyone has heard the motto ' **a picture is worth a 1000 words** '. In
today's media driven world, it's essential for anyone who's in the public eye
to present themselves in a unique and professional manner. Having professional
and modern headshots taken by a headshot photographer in NYC can present to
the public exactly who you are and what you're all about is one of the
absolute best ways for you to find the success you're looking for.

People don’t want to buy from companies. People want to buy from other people,
so that they can strengthen an emotional connection and feel good about the
purchase. They want to buy from people with whom they have a real emotional
bond. And that means they want to buy from people they know – whose stories
they know.  
  
In a world of Internet-savvy individuals, your corporate headshot is your
first line of contact, and if it doesn’t speak well of you, your competitions
will capitalize on it and make bucks off you. A small business owner will
essentially need a headshot for their social media profiles, their blog and
website, and another type of material. CEOportrait is poised to help you
communicate what your business represent using the power of business
portraits.
